comments: easy A. barely showed up typed my papers the night before still got an A in the class. its a really boring class though.

Great professor! Always willing to help out no matter what and goes above and beyond what is expected from a professor. Challenging class but if you put in effort and time you will definitely be able to do well! Mr. O is awesome!!

I actually took him for 1101 and 1102. He is very clear and easy with grading, you just need to listen to his presentations. He really hates when students walk in more that 2 minutes late, if it is a normal thing. He doesn\'t really have a sense of humor, but he is nice and will help if you ask.

Class was made to be online with how easy it was. Classroom lecture was pointless since all you needed to do was look at previous papers written by students to get an idea on how to write the paper. Does give 20 extra points at the end of the semester for perfect attendance however he adds 20 points to points available so the 20 points become moot

I LOVED this teacher! He really helped you understand the material and told you exactly what he wanted in your papers. As long as you try on your papers, do the journal entries (super easy points), and participate in class...You will have no problems! Attendance is mandatory, you can only miss like 3 or 4 days. But he make is fun to come to class.

Great teacher, very very easy. You never have homework except five essays with enough time to complete each one and a reading assignment once in a while. Highly recommend taking Mr.O for english 1101.

Easiest class ever. Gives about a month for each essay, which are all 3-4 pages in length. Gives PP lectures during which he tells you exactly how he wants you to write the essay. If you pay attention, there is no way you can\'t get an A. Awesome teacher, very nice, very cool. Extra credit if you miss only 0-3 days.

He gives five essays and reading as homework. I really like that we can sent him the essays and not have to print them out. He give powerpoints for each essay, also give us mini writing excercises that are not hard. He let you use your own topic but he will pick the technique that we will use to write.

Mr. Obradovich makes writing fun. He lets you pick essay topics sometimes. Very clear on what he wants from his students. Before essays we have powerpoints on examples. Pretty easy grader. Come to class it\'ll help you. You have 5 essays, but they\'re spread apart. No homework other than rough drafts, essays and a few reading assignments. Take him!
He is extremely helpful and breaks things down really well. I think this is an extremely easy class. But it may because of how well he teaches.

Mr. O is an awesome teacher! He is so laid back and chill, but when it comes to work, he means buisness. He is so helpful with the essays and what he expects from you. He is always willing to meet with you if you need help or clarity on something. He isnt too harsh of a grader and you almost always get out of class early :) Itll be a fun semester!

Pretty easy teacher. You do your work, he won\'t give your low grade. The whole class is for the final research paper, due at the end of the semester. He breaks the research paper into pieces so you can work on it piece by piece. And the final exam is just a paragraph analyzing one article for a bit.

Really great class! Mr. O is so easy going. I couldn\'t make it the day our first paper was due because I had stomach flu and he was so understanding. He also let me make up a project after I got a concussion. He is so clear about everything and is so helpful. As long as you do what he asks of you, you will get a good grade.

This is a GREAT English Composition professor! He explains things very well. The exercises you do in class help you a lot when writing essays. He is very understanding and makes sure that the class is on the same page as him. I highly recommend taking him! Pretty easy A if you put the effort into the class.

He is very good at teaching. Breaks things down and explains what you need to learn and isn?t that picky, and very organized. Gives good writing assignments, and makes them broad so you can have fun with it. I found that he is a little boring, but maybe that was I took the morning class. I would highly suggest taking him for any writing class.
Good teacher although he does think that his way is the only way which can get kinda annoying but became a better writer regardless very easy and can be fun

Nick is the best english teacher I have ever had. I honestly get sick of english so fast will all the writting, but he spaces assignments out really good and the assignments are only 1.5-2 pages. He let us out early 50% of the time. Very laid back. Easy A or B. Oh and I didn\'t even need to buy the books.

Nick really tries to make his english class fun. He tries to make your topic for papers relatable to you. If you ever need help, he\'s there and is easy to get into contact with. Definitely take him for english.

the best english teacher that i ever had in my life. his assigments are very easy and interesting an easy a i would recomend this teacher. you must show in class. imissed a lot of days so i think that my grade will godown a little bit couse of it

Best English teacher I\'ve ever had. Attendance is mandatory, but he is flexible. Technical teacher, fair grader. He really wants you to become a better writer. He lets you choose essay topics,keeping assignments interesting. Easy course as long as you simply apply what he teaches in class.
